content:
I am Arthur, a 21-year-old French self-taught full-stack developer living in Paris. I am currently studying Solutions Architecture as part of a Master's degree at EEMI.

Being a very imaginative person and passionate about new technologies, my first computer and coding project at the age of 12 changed my life. My mind was able to channel itself and I was able to bring some of my dream projects to life.

Today, I love building tools that make developers' lives easier. I often say "I make dumb tools for dumb developers".
